org.anarres.dhcp.v6.service

Class AbstractDhcp6Service

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.anarres.dhcp.v6.service.AbstractDhcp6Service
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Dhcp6Service
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LeaseManagerDhcp6Service

    public abstract class AbstractDhcp6Service
extends Object
implements Dhcp6Service
    Base DHCPv6 service outlining the standard DHCPv6 communication patterns defined in https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3315 Created by marosmars.

                                          @Nonnull
                                          Dhcp6Message incomingMsg)
                                   throws Dhcp6Exception
        Description copied from interface: Dhcp6Service
        Try to reply to client's request. Its possible to return absent response, which means no response will be sent to the client
